summary: Makes female characters nude (including parts) - Now with Clean/Dirty version, Pubic Hair/Hairless versions and Beast Races! (Khajiit and Argonian) - All 2048x2048 and Seamless, and more optimised as of version 1.5.
descriptionHtml:
[color=FFFF77]---Skyrim has been Dimonized: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709[/url]. You might want to check out the new bodies by dimon99 (of Fallout fame). They are coming along very nicely and have a more normal body shape than the other options. It still needs a little work, but they already look better than all the alternatives.---[/color]



[center][color=6688FF][b][size=+1]====FIRST SKYRIM FILE OF THE MONTH WINNER (NOVEMBER 2011)====[/size][/b][/color][/center]

I decided to accept I am a nude modder and finished the job.

This mod removes the underwear from female characters, and adds what should be under the underwear. Just extract into the Data folder of the Skyrim installation.



[color=FF9944]NEW IN VERSION 1.5 (30/12/11):[/color]

- Resized/Repositioned nipples
- Optimised file format for normal maps, to remove blockiness
- Added fomod installer, for easy selection of optional textures through NMM

[color=FF9944]NEW IN VERSION 1.4 (22/11/11):[/color]

- Some alterations to textures to improve minor issues
- Optimised file format at a still high resolution (2048x2048) to improve performance with no noticeable drop in quality
- Made all installation possible via Nexus Mod Manager for easy install (no more Full package)

(if you prefer to use the old extra-large textures, you can still find the optional texture downloads for the 1.3 version in the \"Old\" section of the files. These will still work with the 1.4 version)

[color=FF9944]NEW IN VERSION 1.3 (15/11/11):[/color]

- New default Argonian texture without nipples (nippled version is optional)
- Corrected belly button placement
- Corrected nipple placement in .msn files
- Removed some blockyness from .msn files
- Corrected stomach colour

[color=FF9944]NEW IN VERSION 1.2 (14/11/11):[/color]

- All textures are now high-res and seamless
- Dirty and Clean version of the textures, with pubic hair and hairless versions of both
- Argonian textures
- Khajiit textures: Default version (two nipples) and Alternate Cat version (8 nipples)



[color=FF9944][b]ALTERNATE TEXTURES BASED ON THIS MOD[/b][/color]

[size=-2](you may need to download the Main download or Mesh-Only download of my mod before installing these... Might as well do it anyway as the mods will overwrite things if they need to)[/size]

- [color=44FF99]Nude Females[/color] by Thepal:  [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=70]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=70[/url]
This mod. Contains a variety of textures for humans, elves, khajiit and argonians.

- [color=44FF99]XCE Patch for Nude Females[/color] by Xenius:  [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=70]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=70[/url]
XCE Detailed Bodies version of the mod, created by Xenius. Download can be found in the files of this mod. You should install [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=256]Detailed Bodies[/url] or [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356]XCE[/url] by Xenius if using this.

- [color=44FF99]4uDIKs RETEX[/color] by 4uDIK: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1232]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1232[/url] (I recommend you take a look at this one as it is quite well done)
- [color=44FF99]Athletic Nude Women[/color] by Raymond Murphy: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=563]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=563[/url]
- [color=44FF99]Khajiit Female Nude[/color] by Nalim666: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2278]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2278[/url]
- [color=44FF99]Natural_Nudes[/color] by iNinja: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1161]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1161[/url]
- [color=44FF99]TEC_NPC_Nude[/color] by Thor: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=538]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=538[/url]
- [color=44FF99]Yep another nude skins[/color] by Hagrid: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=570]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=570[/url]
- [color=44FF99]Neytiri Nude Skin[/color] by triplex2011: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2540]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2540[/url]
- [color=44FF99]Shadows Darker Argonian Nipples[/color] by Shadow62: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=697]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=697[/url]
- [color=44FF99]TEC_NPC_Undies[/color] by Thor: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=552]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=552[/url]
- [color=44FF99]Khajiit pink nipples[/color] by Kuunkulta: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3310]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3310[/url]

[color=FF9944][b]OTHER RELATED MODS[/b][/color]

- [color=44FF99]Skimpy partially nude armor and clothes[/color] by Templar666: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1274]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1274[/url]
- [color=44FF99]AjuntaPall316s Glass Armor[/color] by AjuntaPall316: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2212]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2212[/url]
- [color=44FF99]Remeshed Female Steel Armor[/color] by tomz31790: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1856]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1856[/url]
- [color=44FF99]Snow Leopard Forsworn Armour Redux[/color] by getcape: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1867]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1867[/url]
- [color=44FF99]Thor Eye Candy[/color] by Thor: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=269]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=269[/url]
- [color=44FF99]Transparent Silk Noturnal Dress[/color] by raziell74: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1585]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1585[/url]
- [color=44FF99]Skyrim Lingerie[/color] by KitsuneShoujo: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3533]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3533[/url]
- [color=44FF99]-WIP- Summer Fashion[/color] by Gilead Maerlyn: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1384]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1384[/url]

[color=FFFF77](If you think you should be included in this list, send me a PM. Or, if for some reason you don\'t want to be included in this list, just let me know.)[/color]



[color=FF9944][b]PERMISSIONS[/b][/color]

If you want to create an alternate texture for this mod, feel free to do so (as long as it is for an adult race and you credit whosever work you have used). I\'d prefer that it was done as an alternate texture mod, so that we can keep them all kinda working together (ie, they can download the mesh-only version here, then pick and choose textures based on which they prefer). If you have created new textures, let me know and I\'ll add them to the list above.

If you want to do anything else with my mod, I\'d prefer you let me know (especially if you are planning something that may be controversial). I\'ve only said \"No\" to one person so far out of dozens who have asked.

[color=FF9944]--PSD FILES NOW UP FOR DOWNLOAD--[/color]
Scroll to the bottom of the Files page and you\'ll find my PSD files used for creating the textures. They contain different layers that you can easily turn on and off to get different options (Clean/Dirty, Pubic Hair/No Hair, etc). They are mostly 4096x4096, which I scaled down to 2048 in the release versions. Feel free to use them to create your own textures (assuming you have access to Photoshop).




[size=-1][color=FFFF77]NUDE FEMALES v1.5
by Thepal


WHAT IT DOES[/color]

Nude Females removes the underwear from female characters in the game, and updates the textures based on what one would expect to see underneath.

The textures are all high-res (2048x2048) and seamless in the current version.


[color=FFFF77]INSTALLATION[/color]

You must have first downloaded the Main Download. Extract it into your Skyrim data folder (this should be your Steam folder\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\) or use the Nexus Mod Manager to install it. This will install the mod with the default Clean textures with pubic hair, or if you are using NMM to install it you will get to choose which textures to install.

If you have done this correctly the mod should work ingame without any other hassle.


[color=FFFF77]OPTIONAL TEXTURES[/color]

The Main Download also includes a variety of optional textures.

Version 1.5 of Nude Females comes with an FOMOD installer. Use NMM to install the mod and you will be presented with an easy to use menu that will set up your optional files for you.

To manually add the alternate textures: choose the textures you want, then move them into the correct folder to overwrite the default files.


[color=FFFF77]REMOVING TEXTURES[/color]

If you want to remove any of the new textures just delete the relevant files, or unselect the mod in the Nexus Mod Manager. If textures are removed the game will revert to the original \"barbie doll\" textures if you don\'t delete the mesh as well.


[color=FFFF77]UNINSTALLING[/color]

To uninstall, just remove the installed files. These will be located in:
- Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets\\
- Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\argonianfemale\\
- Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female\\
- Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\khajiitfemale\\


[color=FFFF77]CREDITS[/color]

All mesh/texture alterations by Thepal.[/size]
author: Thepal

files.name: Extra Texture Modded Casual Outfit Spectre Shirt MaleShep Metal
